README.html.title: Data.Doublets.Json | LinksPlatform's Platform.Data.Doublets.Json Library
README.html.keywords: Data.Doublets.Json LinksPlatform's Platform.Data.Doublets.Json Class Library. Namespace: Platform.Data.Doublets.Json NuGet package: Platform.Data.Doublets.Json Documentation PDF file with code for e-readers. Depends on Platform.Data.Doublets Tools json2links SYNOPSIS json2links SOURCE DESTINATION [DOCUMENT_NAME] PARAMETERS SOURCE - a json file path. DESTINATION - a links storage path. DOCUMENT_NAME - a document name. Default : SOURCE 's file name without extension. Note: DOCUMENT_NAME is used to define what name to save a document with. A links storage can contain multiple json documents. Example Install dotnet tool install --global json2links Import a json file from a doublets links storage json2links documents/enwiki.json databases/wikimedia.links "English Wikipedia" links2json SYNOPSIS links2json SOURCE DESTINATION [DOCUMENT_NAME] PARAMETERS SOURCE - a links storage path. DESTINATION - a json file path. DOCUMENT_NAME - a document name. Default : DESTINATION 's file name without extension. Note: DOCUMENT_NAME is used to choose which json document to export from a links storage. A links storage can contain multiple json documents. Example Install dotnet tool install --global links2json Export json file to doublets links storage links2json databases/wikimedia.links documents/enwiki.json "English Wikipedia"
